name: Helmet (Itizso)
description:
Playable 3D simulation of this   classic handheld electronic game including views of the original packaging and instruction guide . A RetroFab simulation Version 0.9.6a Details Title Helmet Model No. CN-07 Series Game & Watch ( Gold Series ) Manufacturer Nintendo Release Date February 21, 1981 Chipset Sharp SM5A ( 32.768 kHz ) Description

Help construction workers avoid getting hit by tools falling from above.

Gameplay

Use the LEFT and RIGHT buttons to move the construction worker from the left side of the screen to the tool shed on the right while dodging the falling tools. But watch your timing as you can only enter the tool shed when the door is open. A miss is scored when a tool hits a construction worker in the head. Three misses and the game is over.

Tips
  • If you manage to score 200 or 500 points all misses will be cleared!
  • In Game B the tools fall progressively faster and the door of the shed opens only for a few seconds at a time.
